articles.content:
Apples Limit Adult Websites feature was way too overzealous
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Apples built-in web content filter for iOS and macOS has apparently been blocking any searches co… [+1802 chars]
articles.description: Apple’s “Limit Adult Websites” content restriction for iPads, iPhones, and Macs has been blocking almost all web searches with the word “Asian” in them for a year. In the latest beta, it’s finally getting fixed.
articles.title: Apple blocked some searches with the word ‘Asian,’ and now it’s getting fixed - The Verge
